title: My account was scammed and stolen
body: I was sent a link by a friend and I followed it, it seemed like a riot setup so i signed in, it said I earned 3000 rp for doing so, but since then my client keeps lagging, kicking me out of messages and when I tired to play I spent the entire game trying to reconnect, mind you my internet and fps where really good. I think the scammers got onto my account, I changed my password already, but how do I get rid of them.

replies.body: Oh no!  It sounds like you may have fallen for a phishing attempt, but don't worry we can help!  I've locked your account just to be extra safe and prevent unauthorized access.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will help with both recovery as well as repairs.  Take heart, we got your back and will see you there!

could you help me as well? 

My account is stuck in the middle of transferring, but I never tried to transfer to another server or anything... pretty sure someone is attempting to hijack. 

I made a ticket, #30513271

Don't worry, we gotchu fam.  I verified that your recovery form was received and has been escalated to our account team.  I don't have an eta on response time, but a specialist will review your case and get back to you as soon as they can.  This will include recovery and potential repairs like transferring you back.  In the meantime, I prefer not to go over what I'm seeing on a public venue, but I locked your account as well to prevent the possibility of weird activities.   Hope that helps offer some relief in the meantime.
Wow, that was very fast, you guys are very good at your jobs, Thank you
It was not completely stolen, I can use it and sign in, but it does not let me do some basic things like message my friends
